articles.title: Judge orders government to repatriate 4 Canadian men held in Syrian camps
articles.description: A judge has ordered the Liberal government to help bring home four Canadian men being held in Syrian camps. Federal Court Justice Henry Brown has directed Ottawa to request repatriation of the men as soon as reasonably possible and provide them with passports…
articles.content:
OTTAWA - 
A judge has declared that four Canadian men being held in Syrian camps are entitled to the federal government's help to return home.
